summary: Tournament app update: in Robin Round 2 and Pre-Quarter Final screens, show qualifying teams with their originating group serial number alongside the team name (display-only).
architectural_notes: Display-only formatting change: prepend originating group serial (e.g., A-2) to qualifying team labels in Robin Round 2 and Pre-Quarter Final; no data model changes.

existing_features.title: Update the Robin Round 2 UI so that any team displayed in Robin Round 2 (including match listings) shows its originating group serial number alongside the team name in the format "<GroupLetter>-<Position> <TeamName>" (example: "A-2 Team 2"), using the group serial from the stage the team originally came from (typically Robin Round 1). This must be a display-only change (do not change persisted data or the underlying Team/Stage models).

Update the Pre-Quarter Final (knockout) screens so that when a qualified (non-placeholder) team is displayed, it is shown as "<OriginGroup>-<OriginPosition> <TeamName>" (example: "A-2 Team 2"), using the team’s originating group serial number. Placeholder labels (e.g., "PQ1", "TBD", "Winner of ...") must continue to render as placeholders and must not receive a group-serial prefix.

Add a shared frontend helper to compute a team’s originating group serial number by scanning the existing in-memory tournament stages (no new persisted fields) and use it consistently for the Robin Round 2 and Pre-Quarter Final displays.

new_feature_requests.summary: In Robin Round 2 and Pre-Quarter Final, display qualifying team labels as "<GroupSerial>-<TeamName>" (e.g., "A-2 Team 2") using the team’s originating group serial number; display-only change.
